column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////came here on a friday night and expected to wait for more than half n hour
column2: but we got seated within 15 mins or so prob because there were only 2 of us.  the service was great here
column3: everyone was friendly.  the pizza were good
column4: but not super delicious maybe because the deep dish pizza was too heavy for me.  but overall
column5: the pizza both deep dish and thin crust was better than the usual pizza.
